title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Interactive Schedule SPA built with HTML, CSS, and JS for seamless user experience. Dynamic updates and color coding showcase past, present, and future hours in a clear, accessible interface. Manage your schedule on the go, from any browser.

title: Friends Quiz
description: Single-page app (SPA) built with JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. Features dynamic question generation, real-time scoring with a 60-second timer, and an optional high score list using local storage. Fully functional and extensible architecture allows for customization and future additions.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: JavaScript weather dashboard. Displays current conditions & 5-day forecasts. Features location search, saving, and local storage for personalized weather tracking.

title: Bootstrap Portfolio
description: V2 Portfolio (Front-End Dev Student): Significant improvements since v1, showcasing diverse projects in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
